name: items
description: A list of compound filter items.

params.name: label
params.description: The label to show for the filter item.

params.name: href
params.description: The URL for the filter item.

params.name: title
params.description: An optional title for the filter item.

name: removeAllText
description: The text to show for the 'Remove all' link.

name: removeAllHref
description: The URL for the 'Remove all' link.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the compound filters.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the compound filters.
